department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Locked based on the description of the document 34
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services  (PSPC) has a requirement for the supply of upgrade locksets. The facility is secured using the Kaba 710 model locksets. The facility is secured using the most up-to-date locksets, specifically the locksets required for Havana tempo deny. Havana tempo deny is currently mandated by law, so this is a mandated legal exception. The implementation of this bid will be done in phases, starting with 100 Kaba 710 model locksets, then proceed to the remaining 230 Kaba 70 locksets. The winner of this bid will be required to implement a locking for upgrades as well as provide an initial serving of conducting an audits to ensure all current locksets are meet company Policy.
duration_in_months: We are seeking a delivery schedule from the winning contractor for 6-12 months and meet 5 daily complains limit, Processing contracting time 90. The customer wait time in a duration of 3-12 months including weekly reporting is requested
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
